mapper.sql: id, data_dic_name, data_dic_value, is_valid, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into t_datadic (data_dic_name, data_dic_value, is_valid, create_date, update_date) values (#{dataDicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataDicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_datadic
data_dic_name,
data_dic_value,
is_valid,
create_date,
update_date,
#{dataDicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataDicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_datadic
data_dic_name = #{dataDicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_dic_value = #{dataDicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_datadic set data_dic_name = #{dataDicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_dic_value = #{dataDicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT d.data_dic_value FROM t_datadic d WHERE d.data_dic_name = #{dataDicName} AND d.is_valid = 1
